data.title: Farzi motion poster out! Shahid Kapoor and Vijay Sethupathi's thriller also features Kay Kay Menon, Raashii
data.meta_description: After treating fans with the first-look poster of Farzi, the makers released the motion poster on January 9. This time, the motion poster unveiled the first look of other prominent cast members, including Kay Kay Menon and Raashii Khanna from the series. The forthcoming action drama is slated to release on Amazon Prime Video on February 10.
data.text:
After treating fans with the first-look poster of Farzi, the makers released the motion poster on January 9. This time, the motion poster unveiled the first look of other prominent cast members, including Kay Kay Menon and Raashii Khanna from the series. The forthcoming action drama is slated to release on Amazon Prime Video on February 10.

FARZI MOTION POSTER OUT

After unveiling the first look poster of Shahid Kapoor and Vijay Sethupathi from the forthcoming series, Farzi, the makers piqued the curiosity again by dropping the motion poster on January 9. The motion poster featured the lead cast of the series, Shahid Kapoor, Vijay Sethupathi, Kay Kay Menon, and Raashii Khanna standing in line as the title gets highlighted towards the end.

Their enigmatic presence and fiery looks surely raise the stakes and it will be exciting to see these actors portraying complex characters, adding layers to the narrative. The official Twitter handle of Amazon Prime Video shared the motion poster and wrote, “blurring the lines between Asli and Farzi from here on (sic)” with an emoticon of money.

MORE ABOUT FARZI
